title: Government Unveils New Growth Plan
description: India's government has announced a sweeping economic stimulus package aimed at boosting manufacturing and infrastructure. Analysts say the plan could add billions to GDP over the next decade.

title: High Court Sets Precedent in Landmark Case
description: In a unanimous ruling, the Supreme Court delivered a historic verdict that redefines citizens' rights and will have far-reaching implications for future litigation.

title: Iconic Actor Announces Retirement
description: Bollywood legend Rajesh Kapoor surprised fans by announcing his retirement from cinema after a career spanning four decades. Tributes have poured in from across the industry.

title: Tech Giant Launches Affordable Smartphone
description: Bharat's leading tech company unveiled a new smartphone that promises top-tier features at a fraction of the cost. The device aims to make cutting-edge technology accessible to millions.

title: Historic Temple Restoration Completed
description: After years of meticulous work, the restoration of a 12th-century temple has been completed. The site, a UNESCO World Heritage candidate, will reopen to pilgrims next month.

title: Local Startup Secures Major Funding Round
description: In a sign of growing investor confidence, a Bengaluru-based fintech startup closed a $50 million funding round led by global venture capital firms. The company plans rapid expansion.

title: Monsoon Brings Relief and Challenges
description: Heavy rains have brought much-needed relief to drought-hit regions, but flooding has displaced thousands in low-lying areas. Relief teams are working around the clock to provide aid.

title: Cricket Team Clinches Series Victory
description: The national cricket team delivered a stunning performance to win the series against their arch-rivals. Celebrations erupted across the country as fans cheered their heroes.
